title: Looking for Flex members
body:
Hi there,

Myself and a friend are looking for 3 members to join a dedicated OCE flex 5 man for the upcoming season.  We want a team to play every Friday flex 5’s from about 9pm to 3am NZST

Rank: solo/duo can be anywhere between silver 3 and gold 3 (we are pretty easy with the rank).

Must have mic and be friendly, we want to win but would rather play with a fun 5 man than a toxic team.

We all need to be willing to learn from each other and grow as a team. 

Let me know in the comments or dm me if you are keen. Looking forward to meeting you

replies.body: Hi i am interested, Please add Crumpets

im keen :D
ive come back from a break, im playing super well and feeling super fresh.
Main Role - Midlane
Can play ADC, Top and Jungle quite well but mid is my most Dominate Role feel free to add me
IGN - ZoDuS
Great. I’ll add you tonight and we can give it a go as a 5 man team
Thanks will add you sometime this week when I’m not so busy

I'm super keen and I play support. Please don't pay attention to my match history hahaha
Add 'tralop' :)
